name: 律界新手
summary: Jolly LLB is a Bollywood courtroom comedy film written ; directed by Subhash Kapoor. The film stars Arshad Warsi, Boman Irani and Amrita Rao in lead roles. The theatrical trailer was revealed on 8 January 2013.[2] The film released on 15 March 2013. The story follows a lawyer as he moves to Delhi and takes on a case involving a hit and run driver.
